title: Adobe Ad Cloud Search Aggregated Measure
description: Adobe Ad Cloud Search Platform generates daily aggregated peformance and conversions data. The data is generated for external search networks like Google Ad Words, Microsoft Bing, Yahoo. The primary consumers of this data is internal Ad Cloud Solutions Team like reporting and algo teams. This is an internal Adobe Solution Class and should not be used for purposes outside of Adobe Ad Cloud Solution.
